complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the user guide creation into subtasks covering each major feature area. Include tasks for content planning, writing, reviewing, and formatting. Consider how to make the guide accessible and user-friendly for different user types.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Creating a comprehensive user guide requires understanding of all app features and the ability to explain them clearly. The task involves documenting 8 different feature areas plus an FAQ section. While not technically complex, it requires significant content creation, organization, and user testing. The guide must be accessible and match the actual app behavior, requiring coordination with the development team. The medium complexity score reflects the substantial content creation effort balanced by the non-technical nature of the task.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the API documentation task into subtasks for each API category. Include tasks for documenting interfaces, creating examples, reviewing for accuracy, and ensuring security. Consider how to structure the documentation for both internal and external developers.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: API documentation requires deep technical understanding of multiple complex systems. The developer must document 7 different API categories including SwiftData models, API clients, voice/vision integrations, and external APIs. This requires precise technical writing and code examples that must be tested for correctness. The documentation must be comprehensive enough for other developers while ensuring no sensitive information is exposed. The complexity is increased by the need to coordinate with multiple development teams responsible for different APIs.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the onboarding flow implementation into subtasks covering UI design, permission handling, account connection, tutorials, and testing. Consider how to make the onboarding experience engaging while collecting necessary permissions and information.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Creating an effective onboarding flow is highly complex as it's the user's first experience with the app and requires integration with multiple systems. The task involves creating welcome content, implementing permission requests for camera/microphone/notifications, connecting to Google accounts, setting up API keys, creating interactive tutorials, and implementing progress tracking. The flow must be both informative and engaging while handling critical setup tasks. The high priority indicates its importance to the project. Technical complexity comes from integrating with multiple permission systems and external authentication.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the developer notes creation into subtasks for documenting architecture, code organization, performance considerations, limitations, and setup instructions. Consider how to make the documentation useful for current and future developers.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Creating developer notes requires comprehensive understanding of the system architecture and implementation details. The task involves documenting architectural decisions, code organization, performance optimizations, limitations, and future improvements. While technically detailed, it's primarily a documentation task rather than implementation. The low priority reflects that it's not critical for initial app functionality. The complexity comes from needing to understand and document the entire system architecture and technical decisions.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the deployment guide creation into subtasks covering code signing, App Store setup, TestFlight distribution, submission process, and required assets. Consider how to make the guide useful for both initial and ongoing deployments.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Creating a deployment guide requires detailed knowledge of Apple's deployment processes. The task involves documenting code signing, App Store Connect setup, TestFlight distribution, App Store submission, and required assets. While technically detailed, it's primarily a documentation task rather than implementation. The medium priority reflects its importance for eventual app distribution. The complexity comes from needing to understand and document Apple's complex deployment processes and requirements.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the voice conversation UI implementation into subtasks covering the main view, conversation display, audio feedback, animations, and accessibility features. Consider how to make the interface intuitive and responsive during voice interactions.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Creating a voice conversation UI involves complex UI design and real-time feedback systems. The task requires implementing a SwiftUI view with waveform animations, conversation history display, context awareness, and one-handed optimization. The high priority indicates its importance to the core app experience. Technical complexity comes from creating responsive animations that provide feedback during voice conversations, implementing a context banner, and ensuring the UI works well with one-handed operation. Performance optimization for active conversations adds additional complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task list view implementation into subtasks covering the main view, different task sections, filtering/sorting, voice commands, and accessibility features. Consider how to make the interface efficient for managing multiple tasks.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Creating a task list view involves complex UI design with multiple sections and interaction methods. The task requires implementing a SwiftUI view with today's tasks, upcoming tasks, overdue tasks, subject color-coding, voice commands, and search functionality. The high priority indicates its importance to the core app experience. Technical complexity comes from implementing efficient filtering and sorting for potentially large task lists, integrating voice commands, and ensuring accessibility with large touch targets. Performance optimization for large datasets adds additional complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the dashboard UI implementation into subtasks covering the main view, subject organization, material cards, search/filtering, animations, and accessibility features. Consider how to make the interface efficient for navigating a large collection of materials.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Creating a subject-organized dashboard UI is highly complex as it's the main navigation hub for the app. The task involves implementing a SwiftUI view with subject-based organization, material cards, search/filtering, sorting options, smooth animations, one-handed optimization, and VoiceOver support. The high priority indicates its critical importance to the app experience. Technical complexity comes from creating an efficient organization system for potentially large numbers of materials, implementing smooth animations, and ensuring accessibility with VoiceOver and large touch targets. Performance optimization for large datasets adds significant complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Google Gemini API client implementation into subtasks covering configuration, different API methods, error handling, rate limiting, and response parsing. Consider how to make the client robust and efficient for various Workspace integrations.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Creating a Google Gemini API client involves complex networking and integration with Google's AI services. The task requires implementing configuration, methods for text generation, Drive research, Calendar parsing, Gmail extraction, error handling, rate limiting, and response parsing. The high priority indicates its importance to core app functionality. Technical complexity comes from working with multiple Google API endpoints, implementing proper error handling and retry logic, managing rate limits, and parsing complex response structures. Swift concurrency implementation adds additional complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the OpenAI API client implementation into subtasks covering configuration, different API endpoints (Chat, Vision, DALL-E, Realtime), WebSocket handling, error management, rate limiting, and response parsing. Consider how to make the client robust and efficient for various AI interactions.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Creating an OpenAI API client infrastructure is highly complex as it involves multiple API endpoints and real-time communication. The task requires implementing configuration, methods for GPT-5 chat, vision analysis, Q&A, DALL-E image generation, WebSocket handling for Realtime API, error handling, rate limiting, and response parsing. The high priority and in-progress status indicate its critical importance to the project. Technical complexity comes from implementing WebSocket connections for real-time audio, managing multiple API endpoints with different requirements, implementing proper error handling and retry logic, and parsing complex response structures. Swift concurrency implementation adds additional complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Enhance Child-Friendly UI and Empathetic Experience
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Enhance Child-Friendly UI and Empathetic Experience' task into subtasks covering: 1) Navigation simplification and tab structure, 2) Touch target optimization and feedback mechanisms, 3) Color system and visual accessibility implementation, 4) Personalization and empathetic tone guidelines, 5) Testing and validation with child users.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves multiple UI/UX components (navigation, touch targets, feedback systems), accessibility considerations, and empathetic design principles. It requires both technical implementation and user experience design with special consideration for children as users. The task spans visual design, interaction design, content strategy, and user testing, making it moderately complex but well-defined in scope.
